subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Marlins, who are off to a 3-12 start and who rank second to last in the majors in attendance, are having a tough go in Miami, where fans have felt burned by ownership.
snippet: The Marlins, who are off to a 3-12 start and who rank second to last in the majors in attendance, are having a tough go in Miami, where fans have felt burned by ownership.
